title: Pre-UFYB 13: Enjoy Weekends & Vacation
itunes:title: Pre-UFYB 13: Enjoy Weekends & Vacation
description:
August is finally here, the time of year when a lot of people go on vacation. Inspired by all the travelers in my life, I decided to dedicate this week’s episode to taking how to take time off from work... without constantly worrying and checking your email.

Learn why you really resist taking time off from work and what you can do in order to enjoy any time off.
content:encoded:
August is finally here, the time of year when a lot of people go on vacation. Inspired by all the travelers in my life, I decided to dedicate this week’s episode to taking how to take time off from work... without constantly worrying and checking your email.

Learn why you really resist taking time off from work and what you can do in order to enjoy any time off.
itunes:subtitle: Learn why you really resist taking time off from work and how to combat it
